alchemancer.3: If you drew this as part of a %data.action.custom.ccug-experiment% ability, %game.attackmodifier.plus2% instead
alchemancer.5: Whenever you consume a potion %game.itemSlot:small%, you may place one %data.action.custom.ccug-vial-token% on an active %data.action.custom.ccug-experiment% card
alchemancer.6: At the end of each of your turns during which you performed no attacks and you are not perfoming a long rest, %game.element.fire%, %game.element.ice%, or %game.element.earth%
alchemancer.7: Activate 12 %data.action.custom.ccug-experiment% abilities with at least two %data.action.custom.ccug-vial-token% used for bonuses during a single scenario
alchemancer.8: Consume six elements in one turn twice during a single scenario

core.1: Add +1 %game.action.attack% for each condition you have
core.2: At the start of each scenario you may perform "%game.condition.strengthen%, %game.condition.wound%, Self" or "%game.condition.ward%, %game.condition.immobilize%, Self"
core.3: Once each scenario, avoid an Overdrive exhaustion check
core.4: Once each scenario, during your turn, remove any number of negative conditions you have
core.5: Kill the last enemy to die in the scenario and finish with nine ability cards in your lost pile
core.6: Trigger an ongoing effect on Chaotic Recursion six or more times in one round

dome.2: Place this card in your active area. On your next attack granting ability, discard this card to add +2%game.action.attack%
dome.3:
Your summons gain %game.action.retaliate%1.
Whenever one of your summons dies, perform: %data.action.custom.ccug-dome-plus% 3
dome.4: At the end of each of your rests, perform: %data.action.custom.ccug-dome-plus% 1 and %data.action.custom.ccug-dome% %game.action.range:4%
dome.5: Once each scenario, at the end of an ally's turn, perform: %data.action.custom.ccug-dome-plus% 5 and %data.action.custom.ccug-dome%, %game.action.target% that ally
dome.6: Only declare rests while your helper bot is adjacent to a figure, but not adjacent to you.
dome.7: Never end your turn with 0 or 1 barrier, and absorb (partially or fully) at least 10 attacks with your barrier.

echowight.2: +1%game.action.attack% for each %data.action.custom.ccug-fog% adjacent to the target
echowight.3: Place one %data.action.custom.ccug-fog% in a hex adjacent to the target
echowight.4: At the end of your turn, if you are adjacent to %data.action.custom.ccug-fog% and have not moved this turn, you may perform: %game.action.move% 1
echowight.5: Once per round, when a door is opened, you may relocate a %data.action.custom.ccug-fog% to a hex within %game.action.range:1% of the opened door
echowight.7: Have at least one enemy adjacent to %data.action.custom.ccug-fog% at the end of every turn there are enemies present on the map
echowight.8: Perform 7 different abilities that place %data.action.custom.ccug-fog% on your first turn
echowight.9: If %game.element.air% is strong or waning, place one %data.action.custom.ccug-fog% in or adjacent to the target's hex.

frostborn.1: Ignore difficult and hazardous terrain during move actions
frostborn.2:
target all adjacent enemies.
This summon cannot suffer damage in any way.

glacial-torrent.1: Create one 1-hex icy terrain tile in a featureless hex adjacent to the target
glacial-torrent.2: and, whenever you would gain %game.condition.brittle%, prevent the condition
glacial-torrent.3: Whenever one of your ally's heals would cause your hit point value to increase beyond your maximum hit point value, gain that much %data.action.custom.ccug-glacier%
glacial-torrent.4: Whenever you end your turn adjacent to icy terrain, perform %game.action.heal:1%, self
glacial-torrent.5: Perform 6 different %game.characterIcon.glacial-torrent% abilities from your ability cards over the course of the first rounds of 6 scenarios
glacial-torrent.6: At the start of each of your rests, have at least 3 %game.characterIcon.glacial-torrent% cards in your active area

jester-twins.1: Place this card in your active area. The next time you force an enemy to move, discard this card and that enemy suffers %game.damage:2%
jester-twins.2: If you are not %data.action.custom.ccug-stacked% after this attack ability, %game.action.teleport% the other %game.characterIcon.jester-twins% to your hex and become %data.action.custom.ccug-stacked%
jester-twins.3: If you are not %data.action.custom.ccug-stacked%, you may end your movement in a hex occupied by an ally to become %data.action.custom.ccug-stacked% on top of the ally
jester-twins.4: You may bring one additional %game.itemSlot:twohand% item into each scenario
jester-twins.5: Your forced movement can move allies through enemies, and enemies through allies
jester-twins.6: Unstack on your first turn and never become %data.action.custom.ccug-stacked%
jester-twins.7: One %game.characterIcon.jester-twins% never suffers damage, and be targeted by at least six attacks

lifespeaker.1: Place this card in your active area. The next time you trigger an element consumption effect, discard this card to gain the effect an additional time
lifespeaker.2: Add +2 %game.action.attack% and suffer %game.damage:1% if %game.characterIcon.lifespeaker% has at least 2 %data.action.custom.ccug-icon%
lifespeaker.3: and, at the start of each of your turns, any number of times, perform: -1 %data.action.custom.ccug-icon%: Move the character token on one of your persistent abilities backwards one slot.
lifespeaker.4: Once each scenario, you may gain up to three %game.condition.enfeeble% cards to gain the same number of %data.action.custom.ccug-icon%
lifespeaker.5: Whenever an enemy draws an %game.condition.enfeeble% card, that enemy reduces the value of their attack by 1 and suffers %game.damage:1% after the attack.
lifespeaker.6: In a single turn, gain 7 element consumption effects
lifespeaker.7: In a single scenario, consume 2 or more elements with 7 different actions
lifespeaker.8: Treat all %game.attackmodifier.minus1% attack modifier cards drawn as %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.
lifespeaker.9: Treat all %game.condition.enfeeble% cards drawn as %game.attackmodifier.plus3% instead.

lightracer.1: You may discard a Speed card to add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle%
lightracer.2: and when you suffer damage during your turn, you may ignore %game.condition.ward%
lightracer.3: Whenever you draw a %game.condition.bless%, perform %game.condition.ward% %game.action.target% 1 ally. If that ally already had %game.condition.ward%, %game.action.heal:1% that ally
lightracer.4: Once each scenario, you may use all of your played cards for their standard action and ignore damage from Speeds that turn
lightracer.5: Play 8 unique Speed actions during your first turn across multiple scenarios.
lightracer.6: For an entire scenario, have at least 2 Speed cards in your active area at the end of each of your turns.

progenitor.1: Add %game.condition.stun% and %game.condition.wound% if this attack is Ponderous
progenitor.2: Add %game.attackmodifier.plus1% instead if this attack is Ponderous
progenitor.3: Place this card in your active area. %game.action.shield:1%. At the start of your next turn, discard this card and %game.action.move:1%
progenitor.4: You are considered to be first in initiative order to determine focus while Ancient Carapace is not spent
progenitor.5: Once each scenario, perform the Ponderous abilities of a card as you play it
progenitor.6: Ignore the effects of %game.condition.immobilize%, %game.condition.disarm%, %game.condition.impair%, %game.condition.stun%, and %game.condition.muddle% during the start of your turn
progenitor.7: Declare a long rest and then kill two or more enemies and loot one or more tokens or tiles during that round
progenitor.8: Move your character token to the first slot of Anicent Carapace six times using %game.condition.regenerate%

reeftender.1: After this attack ability, %game.action.teleport% one of your summons to an unoccupied hex adjacent to %game.characterIcon.reeftender%
reeftender.2: Whenever you declare a long rest, you may move one of your summons to your discard pile to perform %game.condition.ward%, self
reeftender.3: Once each scenario, when your summon would suffer %game.damage%, negate the %game.damage%, %game.action.teleport% to the hex occupied by that summon, and place that summon in an empty hex closest to you
reeftender.4: Your summons gain advantage on all attacks performed while adjacent to you
reeftender.5: Play four summons before your first rest and keep them alive the entire scenario.
reeftender.6: Move a summon to your discard pile when they die ten times in one scenario.
reeftender.8: On death, leave this card in your active area.
reeftender.9: After ending a %game.action.move% or %game.action.teleport% adjacent to %game.characterIcon.reeftender%, gain %game.condition.invisible%.

skitterclaw.1: After the attack ability, grant one of your summons: %game.action.move:2%
skitterclaw.2: If the target is Latched, %game.attackmodifier.plus2% instead
skitterclaw.4: You may summon %data.action.custom.ccug-critter% summons in adjacent occupied hexes
skitterclaw.5: Once per scenario, when you or an ally would suffer %game.damage% from an attack, remove a Latched summon from the attacker or the target to negate the damage instead
skitterclaw.6: At the start of each scenario, you may play a card from your hand to perform a summon action of the card
skitterclaw.7: Have at least one Latched summon on four different enemies
skitterclaw.8: Have your summons perform twelve attacks in one round
skitterclaw.9: All attacks targeting the Latched enemy add %game.action.pierce:1%.
skitterclaw.10: +1 %game.action.attack% for each Latched summon on self.

wildborn.3: Place this card in your active area. On your next commanded attack, discard this card to add +2 %game.action.attack%
wildborn.4: On your next commanded attack, discard this card to add +2 %game.action.attack%
wildborn.5: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeScenario% and treat all %data.action.custom.ccug-essence% as Stable during one round each scenario
wildborn.6: Whenever you or one of your allies would suffer exactly %game.damage:2%, that figure may lose %game.condition.ward% to suffer no %game.damage% instead
wildborn.7: At the start of each scenario, you may %game.element.wild%
wildborn.8: Play at least 8 %game.card.lost% actions without exhausting
wildborn.9: Stabilize 4 different %data.action.custom.ccug-essence% during your first rest over the course of any 4 scenarios

woebound.1: where X is the number elements you have consumed this turn
woebound.2: Whenever you consume an element as a mandatory part of an action, you may generate that same element
woebound.3: At the start of each scenario, %game.element.wild%
woebound.5: Consume at least three elements on each of your turns after the first round, without exhausting
woebound.6: Have %game.action.shield% 2 on each attack targeting you that would cause you to suffer damage, and be attacked at least 15 times.

veilpiercer.1: The target and all enemies adjacent to it suffer %game.damage:1%
veilpiercer.2: Unlock The Astral Plane, and start each scenario with %game.condition.invisible%
veilpiercer.3: Whenever you long rest, you may perform "%game.action.teleport% 2"
veilpiercer.4: Once each scenario, during your turn, place one %data.action.custom.ccug-veil% in a hex within %game.action.range:4%
veilpiercer.5: Complete 5 Plane cards in a single scenario
veilpiercer.6: Never attack an enemy adjacent to you or be attacked by an enemy adjacent to you in a single scenario

vimthreader.1: If the target has an attribute, add %game.condition.wound%, %game.condition.poison%, %game.condition.muddle%
vimthreader.2: Whenever you short rest, one adjacent enemy suffers %game.damage:1%, and you perform "%game.action.heal:1%, self"
vimthreader.3: At the start of each scenario, you may suffer %game.damage:1% to grant all allies and self %game.action.move:3%
vimthreader.4: Once each scenario, remove all negative conditions you have. One adjacent enemy suffers %game.damage% equal to the number of conditions removed
vimthreader.5: For an entire scenario, perform a heal ability and cause a figure to suffer %game.damage% each round
vimthreader.6: Gain the attributes of 12 different monster types
